name: Crystal Combat
description:
This is a Retro Multiplayer simple game to collect and battle with rock, plant, crystal monsters.! Best to play when you are bored in class.

note from the developer: this game is developed by pygame. I am a solo developer that used most of my time off my school to develop this game. I really want some feedback so that I can create a better cleaner game in the future.
